dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements or conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively defend their position and may become confrontational when necessary.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and work to find mutually beneficial solutions.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach solving problems or making decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically analyze data and evaluate options before making a decision.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and experience to make decisions, often relying on instinct rather than careful analysis.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin consider the global implications of their actions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize national interests and may be skeptical of international cooperation.
Your FarTwin will consider the global implications of their actions and strive for a more unified world order.

dimensions.label: Career Goals
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their career development?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for rapid advancement and may prioritize short-term gains over long-term stability.
Your FarTwin will prioritize job security and stability, often valuing predictability over personal growth.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning new information or skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experience and direct application.
Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through abstract concepts, theories, and academic study.

dimensions.label: Relationship Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach building and maintaining relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize social connections and may seek out large groups of people to interact with.
Your FarTwin will value deep, meaningful relationships and may be more selective about who they open up to.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach managing their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for precision and may become overly focused on time management to avoid mistakes.
Your FarTwin will prioritize adaptability and may be more relaxed about meeting deadlines.
